headline: Introducing Polish: Automatic Image Optimization
keywords: Mobile, Bandwidth, Polish, Product News, Speed, Speed & Reliability
description: Today, the average web page has more than 85 objects (images, Javascript, CSS, etc.) that make up more than 750 KB of data. All that data needs to be downloaded when a page loads. On the average web page, more than 50% of the data is made up of images.
